TopicTitle: Have to quit and restart from menu to be able to lock a target.

Articles.Content:
When I am near another craft, I try right-clicking, double clicking, and I can't 'choose' the other craft. I quicksave and quit to menu, then restart the save, and I can suddenly 'set target'.

I hit the "]" key to go over and orient the other craft, and I can't 'target' the first one. I quit to menu, restart the save, and suddenly I can. It makes docking agonizing.

Sorry. moved to 'Bug Report Forum'
